mapper.update: update l_group set groupid=groupid ,groupcode=#{groupcode} ,groupname=#{groupname} ,provinceid=#{provinceid} ,cityid=#{cityid} ,countyid=#{countyid} ,groupaddress=#{groupaddress} ,postalcode=#{postalcode} ,artificialperson=#{artificialperson} ,artificialidcard=#{artificialidcard} ,linkman=#{linkman} ,linkmanidcard=#{linkmanidcard} ,telnumber=#{telnumber} ,faxnumber=#{faxnumber} ,groupurl=#{groupurl} ,bankname=#{bankname} ,bankaccno=#{bankaccno} ,remark=#{remark} ,creditcode=#{creditcode} ,taxregno=#{taxregno} ,taxnature=#{taxnature} ,businessrep=#{businessrep} ,businessscope=#{businessscope} ,longitude=#{longitude} ,latitude=#{latitude} ,createuserid=#{createuserid} ,createtime=#{createtime} where groupid=#{groupid}

update l_group set groupid=groupid ,groupcode=#{groupcode} ,groupname=#{groupname} ,provinceid=#{provinceid} ,cityid=#{cityid} ,countyid=#{countyid} ,groupaddress=#{groupaddress} ,postalcode=#{postalcode} ,artificialperson=#{artificialperson} ,artificialidcard=#{artificialidcard} ,linkman=#{linkman} ,linkmanidcard=#{linkmanidcard} ,telnumber=#{telnumber} ,faxnumber=#{faxnumber} ,groupurl=#{groupurl} ,bankname=#{bankname} ,bankaccno=#{bankaccno} ,remark=#{remark} ,creditcode=#{creditcode} ,taxregno=#{taxregno} ,taxnature=#{taxnature} ,businessrep=#{businessrep} ,businessscope=#{businessscope} ,longitude=#{longitude} ,latitude=#{latitude} ,createuserid=#{createuserid} ,createtime=#{createtime} where 1=1 and groupid in (${Where_IdsStr}) and groupid =#{Where_Id} and groupid=#{Where_groupid} and groupcode=#{Where_groupcode} and groupname=#{Where_groupname} and provinceid=#{Where_provinceid} and cityid=#{Where_cityid} and countyid=#{Where_countyid} and groupaddress=#{Where_groupaddress} and postalcode=#{Where_postalcode} and artificialperson=#{Where_artificialperson} and artificialidcard=#{Where_artificialidcard} and linkman=#{Where_linkman} and linkmanidcard=#{Where_linkmanidcard} and telnumber=#{Where_telnumber} and faxnumber=#{Where_faxnumber} and groupurl=#{Where_groupurl} and bankname=#{Where_bankname} and bankaccno=#{Where_bankaccno} and remark=#{Where_remark} and creditcode=#{Where_creditcode} and taxregno=#{Where_taxregno} and taxnature=#{Where_taxnature} and businessrep=#{Where_businessrep} and businessscope=#{Where_businessscope} and longitude=#{Where_longitude} and latitude=#{Where_latitude} and createuserid=#{Where_createuserid} and createtime=#{Where_createtime}
mapper.select: select t.groupid "groupid", t.groupcode "groupcode", t.groupname "groupname", t.provinceid "provinceid", t.cityid "cityid", t.countyid "countyid", t.groupaddress "groupaddress", t.postalcode "postalcode", t.artificialperson "artificialperson", t.artificialidcard "artificialidcard", t.linkman "linkman", t.linkmanidcard "linkmanidcard", t.telnumber "telnumber", t.faxnumber "faxnumber", t.groupurl "groupurl", t.bankname "bankname", t.bankaccno "bankaccno", t.remark "remark", t.creditcode "creditcode", t.taxregno "taxregno", t.taxnature "taxnature", t.businessrep "businessrep", t.businessscope "businessscope", t.longitude "longitude", t.latitude "latitude", t.createuserid "createuserid", t.createtime "createtime" from l_group t where groupid=#{groupid}

select t.groupid "groupid", t.groupcode "groupcode", t.groupname "groupname", t.provinceid "provinceid", t.cityid "cityid", t.countyid "countyid", t.groupaddress "groupaddress", t.postalcode "postalcode", t.artificialperson "artificialperson", t.artificialidcard "artificialidcard", t.linkman "linkman", t.linkmanidcard "linkmanidcard", t.telnumber "telnumber", t.faxnumber "faxnumber", t.groupurl "groupurl", t.bankname "bankname", t.bankaccno "bankaccno", t.remark "remark", t.creditcode "creditcode", t.taxregno "taxregno", t.taxnature "taxnature", t.businessrep "businessrep", t.businessscope "businessscope", t.longitude "longitude", t.latitude "latitude", t.createuserid "createuserid", t.createtime "createtime" from l_group t where 1=1 and t.groupid=#{groupid} and t.groupcode=#{groupcode} and t.groupname=#{groupname} and t.provinceid=#{provinceid} and t.cityid=#{cityid} and t.countyid=#{countyid} and t.groupaddress=#{groupaddress} and t.postalcode=#{postalcode} and t.artificialperson=#{artificialperson} and t.artificialidcard=#{artificialidcard} and t.linkman=#{linkman} and t.linkmanidcard=#{linkmanidcard} and t.telnumber=#{telnumber} and t.faxnumber=#{faxnumber} and t.groupurl=#{groupurl} and t.bankname=#{bankname} and t.bankaccno=#{bankaccno} and t.remark=#{remark} and t.creditcode=#{creditcode} and t.taxregno=#{taxregno} and t.taxnature=#{taxnature} and t.businessrep=#{businessrep} and t.businessscope=#{businessscope} and t.longitude=#{longitude} and t.latitude=#{latitude} and t.createuserid=#{createuserid} and t.createtime=#{createtime}

select t.groupid "groupid", t.groupcode "groupcode", t.groupname "groupname", t.provinceid "provinceid", t.cityid "cityid", t.countyid "countyid", t.groupaddress "groupaddress", t.postalcode "postalcode", t.artificialperson "artificialperson", t.artificialidcard "artificialidcard", t.linkman "linkman", t.linkmanidcard "linkmanidcard", t.telnumber "telnumber", t.faxnumber "faxnumber", t.groupurl "groupurl", t.bankname "bankname", t.bankaccno "bankaccno", t.remark "remark", t.creditcode "creditcode", t.taxregno "taxregno", t.taxnature "taxnature", t.businessrep "businessrep", t.businessscope "businessscope", t.longitude "longitude", t.latitude "latitude", t.createuserid "createuserid", t.createtime "createtime" from l_group t where 1=1 and t.groupid=#{groupid} and t.groupcode=#{groupcode} and t.groupname=#{groupname} and t.provinceid=#{provinceid} and t.cityid=#{cityid} and t.countyid=#{countyid} and t.groupaddress=#{groupaddress} and t.postalcode=#{postalcode} and t.artificialperson=#{artificialperson} and t.artificialidcard=#{artificialidcard} and t.linkman=#{linkman} and t.linkmanidcard=#{linkmanidcard} and t.telnumber=#{telnumber} and t.faxnumber=#{faxnumber} and t.groupurl=#{groupurl} and t.bankname=#{bankname} and t.bankaccno=#{bankaccno} and t.remark=#{remark} and t.creditcode=#{creditcode} and t.taxregno=#{taxregno} and t.taxnature=#{taxnature} and t.businessrep=#{businessrep} and t.businessscope=#{businessscope} and t.longitude=#{longitude} and t.latitude=#{latitude} and t.createuserid=#{createuserid} and t.createtime=#{createtime}
mapper.delete: delete from l_group where 1=1 and groupid in (${Where_IdsStr}) and groupid =#{Where_Id} and groupid=#{Where_groupid} and groupcode=#{Where_groupcode} and groupname=#{Where_groupname} and provinceid=#{Where_provinceid} and cityid=#{Where_cityid} and countyid=#{Where_countyid} and groupaddress=#{Where_groupaddress} and postalcode=#{Where_postalcode} and artificialperson=#{Where_artificialperson} and artificialidcard=#{Where_artificialidcard} and linkman=#{Where_linkman} and linkmanidcard=#{Where_linkmanidcard} and telnumber=#{Where_telnumber} and faxnumber=#{Where_faxnumber} and groupurl=#{Where_groupurl} and bankname=#{Where_bankname} and bankaccno=#{Where_bankaccno} and remark=#{Where_remark} and creditcode=#{Where_creditcode} and taxregno=#{Where_taxregno} and taxnature=#{Where_taxnature} and businessrep=#{Where_businessrep} and businessscope=#{Where_businessscope} and longitude=#{Where_longitude} and latitude=#{Where_latitude} and createuserid=#{Where_createuserid} and createtime=#{Where_createtime}
mapper.select: select t.groupid "groupid", t.groupcode "groupcode", t.groupname "groupname", t.provinceid "provinceid", t.cityid "cityid", t.countyid "countyid", t.groupaddress "groupaddress", t.postalcode "postalcode", t.artificialperson "artificialperson", t.artificialidcard "artificialidcard", t.linkman "linkman", t.linkmanidcard "linkmanidcard", t.telnumber "telnumber", t.faxnumber "faxnumber", t.groupurl "groupurl", t.bankname "bankname", t.bankaccno "bankaccno", t.remark "remark", t.creditcode "creditcode", t.taxregno "taxregno", t.taxnature "taxnature", t.businessrep "businessrep", t.businessscope "businessscope", t.longitude "longitude", t.latitude "latitude", t.createuserid "createuserid", t.createtime "createtime" from l_group t where 1=1 and t.groupid=#{groupid} and t.groupcode=#{groupcode} and t.groupname like #{groupname} and t.provinceid=#{provinceid} and t.cityid=#{cityid} and t.countyid=#{countyid} and t.groupaddress=#{groupaddress} and t.postalcode=#{postalcode} and t.artificialperson=#{artificialperson} and t.artificialidcard=#{artificialidcard} and t.linkman=#{linkman} and t.linkmanidcard=#{linkmanidcard} and t.telnumber=#{telnumber} and t.faxnumber=#{faxnumber} and t.groupurl=#{groupurl} and t.bankname=#{bankname} and t.bankaccno=#{bankaccno} and t.remark=#{remark} and t.creditcode=#{creditcode} and t.taxregno=#{taxregno} and t.taxnature=#{taxnature} and t.businessrep=#{businessrep} and t.businessscope=#{businessscope} and t.longitude=#{longitude} and t.latitude=#{latitude} and t.createuserid=#{createuserid} and t.createtime=#{createtime}

select count(*) from l_group t where 1=1 and t.groupid=#{groupid} and t.groupid!=#{NoId} and t.groupcode=#{groupcode} and t.groupname like #{groupname} and t.provinceid=#{provinceid} and t.cityid=#{cityid} and t.countyid=#{countyid} and t.groupaddress=#{groupaddress} and t.postalcode=#{postalcode} and t.artificialperson=#{artificialperson} and t.artificialidcard=#{artificialidcard} and t.linkman=#{linkman} and t.linkmanidcard=#{linkmanidcard} and t.telnumber=#{telnumber} and t.faxnumber=#{faxnumber} and t.groupurl=#{groupurl} and t.bankname=#{bankname} and t.bankaccno=#{bankaccno} and t.remark=#{remark} and t.creditcode=#{creditcode} and t.taxregno=#{taxregno} and t.taxnature=#{taxnature} and t.businessrep=#{businessrep} and t.businessscope=#{businessscope} and t.longitude=#{longitude} and t.latitude=#{latitude} and t.createuserid=#{createuserid} and t.createtime=#{createtime}
SELECT COUNT(*) from l_group where 1=1 and groupname=#{groupname} and groupid!=#{groupid}
